data.title: A Brief Consideration of the Hip-Hop Biopic
data.meta_description: From the beginning, the moving image and narrative film have played an integral if still under-theorized role in both documenting and creating hip-hop culture; enough so that I think an argument can be made that it is a forgotten “fifth” element of...
